comments.body: Side note: It is starting to become attractive to overload `createCmd` and friends so we don’t get collisions between daml triggers and daml script. I expect in almost all cases type inference will work fine here but needs someone to actually try it out.
I would expect the same, particularly when you use a helper function like the newly introduces `script`.
